instructions.content:
Think about your eating habits over the past year or so. About how often do you eat each of the following foods? Remember breakfast, lunch, dinner, snacks and eating out. Answer for each of these foods:

Read each answer choice aloud before selecting the participantâ€™s answer.

questions.name: fruit_juice
questions.questionText: Fruit juice, like orange, apple, grape, fresh frozen or canned (Not sodas or other drinks.)

questions.name: fruit
questions.questionText: How often do you eat any fruit, fresh or canned? (Not counting juice.)

questions.name: vegie_juice
questions.questionText: Vegetable juice, like tomato juice, V-8, carrot

questions.name: potatos
questions.questionText: Potatoes, any kind, including baked, mashed or French fried

questions.name: vegie_soup
questions.questionText: Vegetable soup, or stew with vegetables

questions.name: other_vegies
questions.questionText: Any other vegetables, including string beans, peas, corn, broccoli or any other kind
